name: BOSSTRIS
description:
You're on vacation but your boss wants you in the office. Use your telekinesis to move objects to create a bridge you can run through!

You use your telekinesis to move household objects off the EDGE of a cliff into a valley to create a bridge your player can travel through before the boss catches him!

Also watch out for the epic bossfight at the end.

DO NOT GET CAUGHT!

The controls are simple

  1. Use the arrow keys to move the objects LEFT and RIGHT
  2. Left click to rotate your object
  3. Click the space bar to get  a new object
  4. It's a classic tetris game.

This game was made by me. Some of the art was made by my sister.

SOME SCREENSHOTS OF BOSSTRIS

**TIPS AND TRICKS** (SUPER SECRET)

  • You do not have to make the bridge solid. The less objects there are underneath the uppermost objects, the less time you waste.
  •  The boss gets a second closer every time you click the spacebar. So try to keep that on the low.
  • REMEMBER your player can only jump ONE block!
